medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Right lower quadrant pain started 4 days ago. Initially dull and intermittent, worsening over the last 2 days, becoming more constant. Pain was worst in the morning and at night. No associated nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, constipation, fever, or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of ulcerative colitis. No previous surgeries.
medical_history.social_history: Social alcohol consumption. No tobacco use.
